recommended_degree: Teknik Mesin, Teknik Konstruksi Perkapalan, Teknik Konstruksi (Sarjana)
job_description:
- Support project planning and progress monitoring activities.
- Assist in compiling production data for daily and weekly project reports.
- Coordinate with multiple departments regarding schedule, materials, and manpower requirements.
- Prepare project documentation such as logs, meeting minutes, and tracking sheets.
- Accompany Project Engineers during site coordination and project execution activities.
